title: The Killing of Freddie Gray – Episode 12 – Police Investigating Police
description:
May 29, 2017 / Commissioner Batts promised a thorough, comprehensive investigation. State’s Attorney Marilyn Mosby promised her own independent investigation. So why was so much of the truth left out in court?

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, Uncanny Valleys, VYVCH, and Sym5.

Thank you to our sponsors!
ThirdLove - www.thirdlove.com/undisclosed 
Wag! – Link directly to the mobile app here: https://app.adjust.com/xv8fal 

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
